hero.title: Production-ready SaaS template
hero.subtitle: Modern, open source starter to launch SaaS apps quickly on Next.js 15 and Cloudflare Workers.

features.heading: Everything you need for a SaaS app
features.description: Built on solid foundations so you can focus on what matters.

login_ready.name: Authentication included
login_ready.description: Full auth system with email/password login, registration, password reset flow and session management powered by Lucia Auth.

database_email.name: Database and email
database_email.description: Drizzle ORM with Cloudflare D1 for the database and React Email with Resend for beautiful email templates.

modern_stack.name: Modern stack
modern_stack.description: Next.js 15 App Router with React Server Components, Server Actions and Edge Runtime for optimal performance.

clean_ui.name: Clean interface
clean_ui.description: Responsive UI with dark/light mode using Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI components.

edge_deploy.name: Edge deploy
edge_deploy.description: Global deployments on Cloudflare Workers with no cold starts, leveraging the speed of the Cloudflare edge network.

dev_experience.name: Developer experience
dev_experience.description: GitHub Actions based deploys, thorough documentation and TypeScript for type safety.

forms.name: Form handling
forms.description: Built-in validation using Zod and React Hook Form for a smooth user experience.

team_ready.name: Team ready
team_ready.description: Designed for collaboration, easy to customize and extend to fit your team's needs.

reset_password.subject: Reset your {siteName} password
reset_password.heading: Reset your password on {siteName}
reset_password.intro: We received a request to reset your {siteName} account password. Click the button below to choose a new password. For security, the link is valid for 1 hour.
reset_password.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your {siteName} password will stay the same.
reset_password.copy_link: If the button above doesn't work, copy this link into your browser:
reset_password.footer: This message was automatically sent by {siteName}. If you didn't request a password reset, ignore it or contact support.

verify_email.subject: Verify your email for {siteName}
verify_email.heading: Verify your email address
verify_email.intro: Thanks for signing up at {siteName}! To finish your registration, you need to verify your email address. Click the button below.
verify_email.expires_in: This verification link expires in {hours} hours. After that you'll need to request a new one.
verify_email.copy_link: If the button above doesn't work, copy this link into your browser:
verify_email.not_expected: If you didn't create an account on {siteName}, just ignore this email.
verify_email.footer: This message was automatically sent by {siteName}. Please do not reply.

team_invite.subject: You've been invited to a team on {siteName}
team_invite.heading: You've been invited to a team on {siteName}
team_invite.intro: {inviterName} has invited you to join the "{teamName}" team on {siteName}.
team_invite.sent_to: This invitation was sent to {email}. If you don't have an account yet, you'll be able to create one after accepting.
team_invite.copy_link: If the button above doesn't work, copy this link into your browser:
team_invite.not_expected: If you weren't expecting this invitation, feel free to delete this email.
team_invite.footer: This message was automatically sent by {siteName}. Please do not reply.
